model.title: Summary conceptual model details
model.description: Return the summary details about a conceptual model

_id.description: The unique identifier (model name) for a conceptual model

_created.description: The (unix timestamp) date value on which this conceptual model was created

sentence_count.description: The total number of sentences defined in this conceptual model

source_ids.description: A list of source ids that define this conceptual model.

concept_names.description: A list of the names of concepts that are defined this conceptual model.
